group.Description: The group a person belongs to

Levels.fcd: person with epilepsy, diagnosed with an FCD

age_scan.Description: categorized age in years at the time of MRI

mri _diagnosis.Description: diagnosis made by neuroradiologists at the University Hospital Bonn at the time of presurgical assesment

Levels.suspicion: Images suggest an FCD type II.
Levels.none: Images did not reveal any pathological changes.
Levels.other: Described structural changes, bu no suspected FCD.

age_op.Description: categorized age at the time of epilepsy surgery

histopathology.Description: histological classification according to the Palmini classification

outcome.Description: Postoperative outcome 12 months after epilepsy surgery according to the Engel classification

Levels.IA: Engel IA: Completely seizure free since surgery
Levels.IB: Engel IB: Nondisabling simple partial seizures only since surgery
Levels.IIA: Engel IIA: Initially free of disabling seizures but has rare seizures now
Levels.IIB: Engel IIB: Rare disabling seizures since surgery
